articles.author: By Chris Lau, Ivana Kottasová, Sophie Tanno, Antoinette Radford and Maureen Chowdhury, CNN
articles.title: Hamas releases third group of hostages during truce with Israel: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: A third set of hostages was released by Hamas on Sunday, including the first American to be successfully freed, according to Israeli and US officials. Follow for live updates.
articles.content:
Another 17 hostages held in Gaza have been released on Sunday, the third such handover during a four-day truce between Israel and Hamas.
Thirteen of the freed hostages were Israeli, three were Thai … [+3159 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Joe Biden backs extension of war pause after latest release by Hamas | Mint - Mint
articles.description: President Joe Biden said he hopes to extend the pause in the Israeli-Hamas war beyond the original four-day deal to facilitate more hostage releases, saying the safe return of 4-year-old American girl shows that the US-brokered cease-fire is working.
articles.content: President Joe Biden said he hopes to extend the pause in the Israeli-Hamas war beyond the original four-day deal to facilitate more hostage releases, saying the safe return of 4-year-old American gir… [+2060 chars]

articles.title: Couple claim eye antibiotic cured dog of mysterious illness sweeping America - Fox News
articles.description: A California couple are claiming their canine recovered from a potentially deadly disease after being treated with a lifesaving antibiotic.
articles.content: A cure to a mysterious and potentially deadly respiratory condition that has been spreading in dogs throughout the country may have been found with a California couple who claim their canine is on th… [+3380 chars]
